name: fishmate
description: AI-powered aquaculture monitoring system for farmers

scripts.cap:sync: npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.cap:sync:ios: npm run build && npx cap sync ios
scripts.cap:sync:android: npm run build && npx cap sync android
scripts.cap:run:ios: npm run cap:sync:ios && npx cap open ios
scripts.cap:run:android: npm run cap:sync:android && npx cap open android
